Trying my best please can someone able to help me how to fix this shit....

item.title: [474]-help-me-please-rep++[474]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“JAMES-W3, post:5, topic:394346”]Here i posted the code here FULL CODE HERE >>: http://pastebin.com/381Vcp4w

or unless this is right

[quote] public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 15;
c.isDead = false;
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
c.killerId = findKiller();
if(o != null) {
c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
o.duelStatus++;
}[/quote][/quote]

Either players[c.killerId] or players[c.playerKilled] is null. Add the following code directly before line 1306 in PlayerAssistant:

if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId] == null) {
    System.out.println("killerId is null");
}
if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerKilled] == null) {
    System.out.println("playerKilled is null");
}

Read full topic
